Name: Puzzle: Fire Sticks
About the game: Hello! I started creating this puzzle at the request of my girlfriend))) The first version was liked by my friends and I decided to run it in Steam. The gameplay is very simple - rearrange the matches so that you get mathematical equality, be smart, collect bonuses, open hidden levels and much more. Key Features: - The game has more than 100 levels of varying difficulty; - Each level has at least one solution, but you can find your own and you will be awarded; - Bonus levels for non-standard passing; - You can use a fire extinguisher and other auxiliary tools; - For skillful passage you can get items of Steam inventory; - In the near future, new game elements and levels will be added; If you like the game, I will make updates, new levels, trading cards and more. The price is symbolic - buy and enjoy! This is not the last project, write your wishes and ideas, we will do it!
